name: Express Train
description:
All aboard! Driving the colorful Express Train from station to station is any toddler’s dream. Your child will play the role of the train driver, build bridges, stop at crossings, help passengers, refuel, and lay new tracks to steer the train safely around obstacles.

Copying grown-ups and their activities is important to your 2-year-old toddler’s development - and few things are as ‘grown-up’ as driving a huge steam train through the scenic countryside, full speed ahead, horns tooting.

If your toddler is fascinated by trains, this simple game will provide new inspiration for hours of creative play.
You will be able to drive steam, diesel or electric locomotives!
